Event.Message: VPN Profile %1 has been created with the following properties: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VpnConnectionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PropertiesString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: VPN Profile %1 could not be created. Error: (%2). Properties: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VpnConnectionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PropertiesString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: VPN Profile %1 could not be deleted. Error: (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VpnConnectionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: VPN Connection %1 has been modified with the following properties: %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VpnConnectionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PropertiesString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: VPN Profile %1 has been created with the following input properties: %2 The following properties could not be updated: %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VpnConnectionName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PropertiesString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="PropertiesNotUpdatedString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
